metadata.title: USN-6225-1 -- Knot Resolver vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Knot Resolver did not correctly handle certain client options. A remote attacker could send requests to malicous domains and cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6225-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  knot-resolver - 5.5.1-5ubuntu0.22.10.1 knot-resolver-doc - 5.5.1-5ubuntu0.22.10.1 knot-resolver-module-http - 5.5.1-5ubuntu0.22.10.1 No subscription required
